;
and
she
was
apparently
meditating
something
that
she
had
to
say
.
  
<EOS>
"
What
are
you
going

?
<EOS>
"
she

,
at
last
,
very

.
"
<EOS>
Can

,

?
<EOS>
"
  
<EOS>
"
I
am

to
the
East
to

the
condition
of
my
race
in

,
"
said

,
gently

as

.
<EOS>
"
<EOS>
The

,

,

,

.
<EOS>
I

.
<EOS>
At

,

.
"
  
<EOS>
There

.
<EOS>
The

seemed

larger
round

Gwendolen
,
and
she
more

.
<EOS>
The

,

.
<EOS>
There

,
the

,

,

,

.
<EOS>
Then

as

-

,

,

,

,

.
<EOS>
Often

,
the

,

,

.
<EOS>
Then

,

,

.
  
<EOS>
That

was

's

,

onward

.
<EOS>
All

of

had
still
left

with
the
implicit

which

,

was

,

that

:
<EOS>

.
<EOS>
But

<EOS>
something

,
and

into

-

.
  
<EOS>
There

a
long
silence
.
<EOS>
Deronda
had
stood
still
,
even
thankful
for
an
interval
before
he
needed
to
say

,
and
Gwendolen
had
sat

<EOS>
the
intensity
of
her
mental

arresting

.
<EOS>
At

that

"
<EOS>
Is

?
"
  
<EOS>
The

.
"
<EOS>

Jew

"

.
<EOS>

,

<EOS>
A

<EOS>
It

,

"

very

,
"

,

.
<EOS>
He

.
<EOS>

?
  
<EOS>
"

<EOS>
"

,
"

.
<EOS>
"

.
"
  
<EOS>
She

,

.
<EOS>
Slowly

.
<EOS>
At

said
 
without

in

<EOS>
"
But

?
<EOS>
"
  
<EOS>
"

,
"

,

.
<EOS>
"
I
am

.
"
  
<EOS>
At

"

<EOS>
I

.
<EOS>
And

.
<EOS>
"
  
<EOS>
Deronda
's

was

.
<EOS>
He
could
not

.
<EOS>
He
seized

.
<EOS>
She

.
  
<EOS>
"
I

,

,

,
"

.
  
<EOS>
His

,
and

.
<EOS>
Then

<EOS>
The

<EOS>
the

,
in

.
<EOS>
Sobs
rose
,
and

fast
.
<EOS>
Deronda
would
not

her
hands
go
 
held
them
still
with
one
of

,
and
himself

her

against

.
<EOS>
She

,

,

.
<EOS>
At

in

,

<EOS>
"
I
said
 
I
said
 
it
should
be
better
 
better
with
me
 
for

known

.
"
  
<EOS>
His

.
<EOS>
She

from

,
and

,

his

away
.
  
<EOS>
"
We
shall
not

,
"
he

.
<EOS>
"
I
will
write
to
you
always
,
when
I

,

will

?
"
  
<EOS>
He

she

,
"
I
will

.
"
  
<EOS>
"
I
shall
be
more
with

,
"
Deronda
said

,

.
<EOS>
"
If

,

,
and
seemed
to

apart
.
<EOS>
Now
we
can
perhaps
never
see

other
again
.
<EOS>
But
our
minds
may
get
nearer
.
"
  
<EOS>
Gwendolen
said
nothing
,
but
rose
too
,
automatically
.
<EOS>
Her
withered
look
of

,
such
as

sun

's

,

:

.
<EOS>
She
felt

he
was
going
,
and
that
nothing

.
<EOS>
The

was

,

;
and

.
  
<EOS>
Deronda
could
not

again
.
<EOS>
He

that
they
must
part
in

,
but
it
was

,

,

.
<EOS>
He
advanced
to
put
out
his
hand
silently
,
and

placed
hers
within

,

what
her

<EOS>
"
You
have

good

.
<EOS>
I

.
<EOS>
I
will
try
 
try
to
live
.
<EOS>
I
shall
think

you
.
<EOS>
What
good
have
I
been
?
<EOS>
Only

.
<EOS>
Do

harm
to
_
<EOS>
you
<EOS>
_
.
<EOS>
It
shall
be
the
better

me
 
<EOS>
"
  
She
could

.
<EOS>
It
was
not
that
she
was

,
but
that
the

she
spoke

.
<EOS>
The

that

a

.
  
<EOS>
She

,

.
<EOS>
Then

other

,

he

.
  
<EOS>
When

,

.
  
<EOS>
"
Gwendolen
,
dearest
,

very
ill
,
"
she
said
,

over

and

.
  
<EOS>
"
Yes
,
mamma
.
<EOS>
But
do
n't
be
afraid
.
<EOS>
I
am
going
to
live
,
"
said
Gwendolen
,
bursting
out

.
  
<EOS>
Her
mother
persuaded
her
to
go

bed
,
and
watched

.
<EOS>
Through

and

she

,
but
cried

the
midst
of
them
to
her
mother
,
"
Do

be
afraid
.
<EOS>
I
shall
live
.
<EOS>
I
mean
to
live
.
<EOS>
"
  
<EOS>
After
all
,
she

;
and
when

,

"

!
<EOS>
You

.
<EOS>
Do

.
<EOS>
I
shall

.
<EOS>
I
shall
be
better
.
"
        
<EOS>
In
the
checkered
area
of
human
experience
the

are
all
mingled
    
as
in

golden
age
:
<EOS>
fruit

;

the

;
one

.
<EOS>
Nay
,
in

our

-

are
continually
one
,
until
himself
    
gathers

and
sows

.
   
<EOS>
Among

that

watch

,

was
,

open

.
<EOS>
Deronda
's

was

.
<EOS>
Even

;

.
  
<EOS>
But

,

as

that

with

,

she

.
<EOS>
And

which

;
and
her

,

,

.
<EOS>
And

about

,

<EOS>
Mirah

<EOS>

<EOS>

only

.
<EOS>
And

<EOS>

,

<EOS>

<EOS>

"
_
<EOS>

<EOS>

<EOS>
_
<EOS>
"

,

.

:
        
Do

.
<EOS>
I

your
words
 
that

<EOS>

<EOS>

<EOS>

<EOS>

<EOS>

<EOS>
It

<EOS>

<EOS>
GWENDOLEN
GRANDCOURT
.
  
<EOS>
The

;

,

<EOS>

's

,
<EOS>

.
<EOS>
But

,
"
Never

,

.
"
  
<EOS>
He

.
<EOS>
One

,
"
Do
not

to
-

.
<EOS>
I
shall
die
before

is
ended
.
"
  
<EOS>
He

,

Mirah

,

,

,

,

that

,

.
  
<EOS>

"

.
<EOS>
Where

,

,

.
<EOS>
Is

?
<EOS>
Have

?
<EOS>
We
shall

.
<EOS>
"
  
<EOS>
He

,

,

.
<EOS>

Ezra
,

Hebrew

of

Unity
,
which
long
for
generations

been

.
  
<EOS>
He

<EOS>
But

,

.
    
<EOS>
"
Nothing
is

for

,
nothing
to

Or

;
no

,

,
  
Dispraise

;
nothing

,
  
And

.
"
